wisheshayen shri lanka nidahas pakshaye lekam warayawa sita, wijathika kumanthrana karuwange athakoluwak bawata pathwu wathman janadhipathiwaraya, athishaya kumanthranakari lesa shri lanka nidahas pakshaye balaya athata gena, ema pakshaye parajaya sandahama itha thuchcha aakarayen kasakawana me thiranathmaka mohothe, bauddha apage awasan ekama nayakaya balayata gena eema sandaha, apa ganna awasan uthsahaya apathe yadoyi adhairyayata path nowi, wisheshayen des wides siyalu denama thama gnyathin hithawathun pawa unandu karawamin jathiya saha sasanaya bera ganime awasan yuthukama sandaha yuhusulu wiya yuthuya.
